name: Bahia - Trinidad - No. 2
additionalNotes: Bahia Trinidad is handcrafted in Nicaragua, Bahia Trinidad employs an oily 2-year-old Nicaraguan wrapper to hug an aged blend of Cuban-seed Nicaraguan long-fillers with a perfect draw for a delectable medium-bodied profile of cedar, cinnamon and leather. An earthy sweetness arrives to complete the finish. Your cigar-smoking pals will all want to bumb one.
